Replace.Text: In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Five Fans", the game is located in the ocean cell at the beginning, land units can board ships and have the ability to enter the ocean cell, and pioneers can build cities in the sea area. +2 [ICON_Science] technology value and +2 [ICON_Culture] culture value every round before opening up the first city. Not subject to flood damage. [NEWLINE] Merchant units have +50% movement range in water and can board boats immediately after unlocking.

Except for the "Shenwei Lingzhuang Five Fans", all units have +10 [ICON_Strength] combat power when attacking, and -5 [ICON_Strength] combat power when defending. Obtain a member of the Ratatosk Agency in ancient times.

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Five Fans", the [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty coefficient of the citizens of the home city increases, and the allies get part of the benefits, and the [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty coefficient of the citizens of foreign cities decreases, and the effect of the enemy city is doubled.

In addition to "Shenwei Lingzhuang Five Fans", cities with a sense of happiness can get an additional +5% [ICON_Science] technology value. A happy city gets +1 [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist points for every academy it has. Cities with ecstatic happiness get double the bonus.

Except for "Shenwei Lingzhuang Fifth Fan", each city will not generate war weariness. A city with a garrison unit gets +3 [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty every round, and if the garrison is a legion or an army, it gets +5 [ICON_Loyalty] loyalty.

Except for "Shenwei Lingzhuang·Five Fans", when military units fight with more advanced units, +7 [ICON_Strength] combat power, and military units are strengthened when developing future technologies. Unlock featured items that increase or decrease Era Points. [NEWLINE]From the modern era onwards, each time you enter a new era, gain 1 point of the chief executive upgrade. [NEWLINE]Gain 1 additional Era Score when you gain [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka or [ICON_CivicBoosted] Apocalypse.

Except for the "Shenwei Lingzhuang Five Fans", +2% [ICON_Production] production capacity in the capital. +1 [ICON_Production] Production for mines on strategic resources; +2 [ICON_Production] Production for mines on bonus and luxury resources.
In addition to "Shenwei Spiritual Clothes Five Fans", it has the characteristics of other dress-up Kotori.
+{1_num}[ICON_Gold] gold coins from adjacent oasis tiles.

When taking damage, does not suffer combat debuffs. +10 [ICON_Strength] combat power when attacking, -5 [ICON_Strength] combat power when defending. \Recovery at the end of each turn, even after moving or attacking. \Injured military units heal 33 points of health each turn, but take 3 points of damage at the start of the turn.
Shell the closest city of all hostile civilizations to lose [ICON_Citizen] population. All units in the path take damage and leave behind volcanic ash.
Commander Kotori's unique super unit, which replaces the Aircraft Carrier.
Wuhe Kotori unique super unit, replaces the Aircraft Carrier. When killed, it will retain 1 point of health and retreat to the [ICON_Capital] capital.
Wuhe Kotori's characteristic melee unit has a unique reinforcement tree. [NEWLINE]Will not suffer combat debuffs when taking damage.
+7 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting against fortified defensive units.
+1 [ICON_Movement] movement power; hills only consume 1 point [ICON_Movement] movement power.
Enemy units within two cells have -4 [ICON_Strength] combat strength. [NEWLINE]Add +4 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when attacking.
+7 [ICON_Strength] combat strength when defending against long-range attacks. [NEWLINE]Recovery +10 on all terrains.
If [ICON_Movement] mobility allows, +1 extra attack per round. Can move after attacking.
+7 against units with higher base combat strength
-4 The morality of this unit is affected by the mask of evil worn by its enemies.
+4 The ghost masks worn by these warriors intimidate the weakest of hearts when attacking.
+7 The ancestral weapons these samurai wield are exceptional in portability, reliability, and sharpness.
+7 The high-quality armor of these warriors became a reliable protection against ranged attacks.
Officer Kotori features an ancient ranged unit that replaces the Archer. [NEWLINE][ICON_Movement] moves more than an archer. Experience gained from battles +50%.
Haunted Kotori's unique melee unit. [NEWLINE]Have monk power-up tree. Has a large combat bonus if located in friendly territory near holy sites.
+20 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when adjacent to the Holy Land Shrine.
+{1_Value} in friendly territory near holy sites
Maid Kotori unique support unit, replaces Medic. [NEWLINE]Heals adjacent units. Also build a shrine, sphinx or pyramid.

Unique building for Captain Kotori, which replaces the Flood Levee. [NEWLINE]Protect the city's coastal lowlands and riverside floodplain tiles from flooding. The initial construction cost and maintenance cost per turn will be determined according to the number of coastal lowlands in this city and the current sea level. If built after a city tile has been flooded, it will fully restore those tiles. But submerged cells cannot be recovered. [NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_Food] Food and +1 [ICON_Production] Production in all floodplain tiles. [NEWLINE]Must be built in a city with one or more coastal lowland tiles. If the city is occupied, it will not be plundered.
The unique area of ​​the Temple Fair Qinli, which replaces the Holy Land and is cheaper to build. [NEWLINE]An alternative religious cult area in your city.
+{1_num}[ICON_Faith] Faith from adjacent volcanic ash soil.
The characteristic building of Kotori in the temple fair, replacing the shrine. [NEWLINE]Allows [ICON_Faith] Faith to buy builders and missionaries. [NEWLINE]Cannot be looted by Scourge.

The characteristic building of Kotori in the temple fair, replacing the shrine. [NEWLINE]Allows [ICON_Faith] Faith to buy builders and missionaries. [NEWLINE]Cannot be looted by Scourge. [NEWLINE]Heroic units acquired or recalled in this city have an additional 10% [ICON_Lifespan] lifespan.

The characteristic building in the temple fair, replacing the temple. [NEWLINE]Allows [ICON_Faith] Faith to buy Pathfinders, Apostles, Gurus, Inquisitors, and Monks if you have the corresponding Faith. [NEWLINE]Since the era of construction or repair, each new era will get an additional +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith. Will not be plundered by natural disasters.

The characteristic building in the temple fair, replacing the temple. [NEWLINE]Allows [ICON_Faith] Faith to buy Pathfinders, Apostles, Gurus, Inquisitors, and Monks if you have the corresponding Faith. [NEWLINE]Since the era of construction or repair, each new era will get an additional +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith. Will not be plundered by natural disasters. [NEWLINE]Recalling heroes in this city will reduce the cost of [ICON_Faith] Faith by 15%.

The characteristic building in the temple fair Qinli, which replaces the sacrificial building, can be strengthened when choosing a worshiped belief. [NEWLINE]Gives 0.6 [ICON_Production] production per [ICON_Citizen] population. +1 [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer points after unlocking the technology "Apprentice". Since the age of construction or repair, every time you enter a new age, you will get an additional +2 [ICON_Faith] faith value. [NEWLINE]Cannot be looted by Scourge.

The characteristic building in the temple fair Qinli, which replaces the sacrificial building, can be strengthened when choosing a worshiped belief. [NEWLINE]Gives 0.6 [ICON_Production] production per [ICON_Citizen] population. +1 [ICON_GreatEngineer] Great Engineer points after unlocking the technology "Apprentice". Since the age of construction or repair, every time you enter a new age, you will get an additional +2 [ICON_Faith] faith value. [NEWLINE]Cannot be looted by Scourge. [NEWLINE]Recalling heroes in this city will reduce the cost of [ICON_Faith] Faith by 15%.

A characteristic building in Wuhe Qinli. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1[ICON_Science] technology value, +1[ICON_Culture] culture value. If in a desert, +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith. Adjacent cells +1 [ICON_Faith] faith value. Cannot be built next to another shrine. Can be built on floodplains.

A characteristic building in Wuhe Qinli. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1[ICON_Faith] Faith Value, +1[ICON_Culture] Culture Value. If in a desert, +1 [ICON_Science] technology value. Adjacent cells +1 [ICON_Gold] gold coins. +1 [ICON_Appeal] Charisma. If adjacent to a wonder, +2 [ICON_Faith] faith value, +1 [ICON_Culture] culture value. Cannot be built next to another Sphinx. Can be built on floodplains.

A characteristic building in Wuhe Qinli. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1[ICON_Faith] Faith, +1[ICON_Food]food. If in a desert, +1 [ICON_Culture] culture value. If it is adjacent to the area, it will get additional benefits. +1 [ICON_Food] food for every adjacent city center. For all other areas that grant an adjacency bonus: +1 if adjacent to the area. Cannot be built next to another pyramid. Can be built on floodplains.
Officer Kotori's characteristic building. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Occupying units get +2[ICON_Strength] defense, automatically get two rounds of fortifications, and provide cure for all units.

Automatically convert any amount of [ICON_Resource_Camael_Gas]{LOC_RESOURCE_CAMAEL_GAS_NAME} into [ICON_Power] electricity and power cities within 6 cells at a rate of: [NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]1 point[ICON_Resource_Camael_Gas]{LOC_RESOURCE_CAMAEL_GAS_NAME}[ICON_PowerRight]5 Click [ICON_Power] for electricity. [NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet] emits a small amount of CO2 into the atmosphere[NEWLINE]Its [ICON_Production] production bonus extends to all city centers within 6 cells that do not receive a power plant building bonus.
Scorching ghosts characteristic improvement facilities. [NEWLINE] -1 [ICON_Appeal] Appeal. Can only be built on land cells with [ICON_Resource_Camael_Gas]{LOC_RESOURCE_CAMAEL_GAS_NAME} resource.

Decommission the power plant currently used by this city and replace it with {LOC_BUILDING_KOTORI_GAS_POWER_PLANT_NAME}. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]{LOC_BUILDING_KOTORI_GAS_POWER_PLANT_NAME}:[NEWLINE]{LOC_BUILDING_KOTORI_GAS_POWER_PLANT_DESCRIPTION}
A mysterious organization assembled in order to talk to the elves and seek to resolve the disasters caused by spacequakes through peaceful means.
[ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka and [ICON_CivicBoosted] Apocalypse provide 5% more civic and tech.
Commander Kotori features a great man. Each has unique abilities, including a passive effect, and a retreat effect.
Instantly creates a special version of Fraxinus with 1 boost level. Provide 1 point of [ICON_Resource_Camael_Gas]{LOC_RESOURCE_CAMAEL_GAS_NAME} every round.
Gain 100 [ICON_Gold] gold per era (at standard game speed). Provide 1 point of [ICON_Resource_Camael_Gas]{LOC_RESOURCE_CAMAEL_GAS_NAME} every round.
Added 1 [ICON_TradeRoute] trade route capacity. Grants 1 merchant unit to the nearest city. Provide 1 point of [ICON_Resource_Camael_Gas]{LOC_RESOURCE_CAMAEL_GAS_NAME} every round.
Enemy units within 2 cells lose 30 HP. Provide 1 point of [ICON_Resource_Camael_Gas]{LOC_RESOURCE_CAMAEL_GAS_NAME} every round.
Gain 50 [ICON_Science] technology and [ICON_Culture] culture points per era (at standard game speed). Provide 1 point of [ICON_Resource_Camael_Gas]{LOC_RESOURCE_CAMAEL_GAS_NAME} every round.
Diplomatic Visibility + {Amount} level to all other civs. Provide 1 point of [ICON_Resource_Camael_Gas]{LOC_RESOURCE_CAMAEL_GAS_NAME} every round.
All land combat units within 2 cells regain all [ICON_Movement] movement and attack capabilities. Provide 1 point of [ICON_Resource_Camael_Gas]{LOC_RESOURCE_CAMAEL_GAS_NAME} every round.

Give enough [ICON_Envoy] envoys to make you the overlord of this city-state. Then remove [ICON_Envoy] envoys from all other players. Provide 1 point of [ICON_Resource_Camael_Gas]{LOC_RESOURCE_CAMAEL_GAS_NAME} every round.
Grant 1 [ICON_Governor] Chief Executive title, or recruit a new [ICON_Governor] Chief Executive. Provide 1 point of [ICON_Resource_Camael_Gas]{LOC_RESOURCE_CAMAEL_GAS_NAME} every round.
Turn adjacent enemy military units under your control. Fully heals all land combat units within 2 cells. Provide 1 point of [ICON_Resource_Camael_Gas]{LOC_RESOURCE_CAMAEL_GAS_NAME} every round.
Similar to a general: within two cells, land units +5 [ICON_Strength] combat power.
